title: How to Disable Facebook Notifications on an iPhone

steps.title: Tap the "More" (☰) button in the bottom-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the "More" (☰) button in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap "Mobile Push".
steps.content: Tap "Mobile Push". This is located in the "How You Get Notifications" section.

steps.title: Uncheck the notifications you no longer want to receive on your iPhone.
steps.content: Uncheck the notifications you no longer want to receive on your iPhone.
